content.gatha1: Paṇḍupalāsova dānisi, yamapurisāpi ca te taṃ (sī. syā. kaṃ. pī.) upaṭṭhitā;
content.gathalast: Uyyogamukhe ca tiṭṭhasi, pātheyyampi ca te na vijjati.
content.gatha1: So karohi dīpamattano, khippaṃ vāyama paṇḍito bhava;
content.gathalast: Niddhantamalo anaṅgaṇo, dibbaṃ ariyabhūmiṃ upehisidibbaṃ ariyabhūmimehisidibbaṃ ariyabhūmimehisidibbaṃ ariyabhūmimehisidibbamariyabhūmiṃ upehisi .
content.gatha1: Upanītavayo ca dānisi, sampayātosi yamassa santike;
content.gathalast: Vāsovāsopi ca te natthi antarā, pātheyyampi ca te na vijjati.
content.gatha1: So karohi dīpamattano, khippaṃ vāyama paṇḍito bhava;
content.gathalast: Niddhantamalo anaṅgaṇo, na punaṃ jātijaraṃ upehisi.
content.gatha1: Anupubbena medhāvī, thokaṃ thokaṃ khaṇe khaṇe;
content.gathalast: Kammāro rajatasseva, niddhame malamattano.
content.gatha1: Ayasāva malaṃ samuṭṭhitaṃsamuṭṭhāya , tatuṭṭhāyataduṭṭhāyataduṭṭhāyataduṭṭhāya tameva khādati;
content.gathalast: Evaṃ atidhonacārinaṃ, sāni kammānisakakammānisakakammāni nayanti duggatiṃ.
content.gatha1: Asajjhāyamalā mantā, anuṭṭhānamalā gharā;
content.gathalast: Malaṃ vaṇṇassa kosajjaṃ, pamādo rakkhato malaṃ.
content.gatha1: Malitthiyā duccaritaṃ, maccheraṃ dadato malaṃ;
content.gathalast: Malā ve pāpakā dhammā, asmiṃ loke paramhi ca.
content.gatha1: Tato malā malataraṃ, avijjā paramaṃ malaṃ;
content.gathalast: Etaṃ malaṃ pahantvāna, nimmalā hotha bhikkhavo.
content.gatha1: Sujīvaṃ ahirikena, kākasūrena dhaṃsinā;
content.gathalast: Pakkhandinā pagabbhena, saṃkiliṭṭhena jīvitaṃ.
content.gatha1: Hirīmatā ca dujjīvaṃ, niccaṃ sucigavesinā;
content.gathalast: Alīnenāppagabbhena, suddhājīvena passatā.
content.gatha1: Yo pāṇamatipāteti, musāvādañca bhāsati;
content.gathalast: Loke adinnamādiyati, paradārañca gacchati.
content.gatha1: Surāmerayapānañca, yo naro anuyuñjati;
content.gathalast: Idhevameso lokasmiṃ, mūlaṃ khaṇati attano.
content.gatha1: Evaṃ bho purisa jānāhi, pāpadhammā asaññatā;
content.gathalast: Mā taṃ lobho adhammo ca, ciraṃ dukkhāya randhayuṃ.
content.gatha1: Dadāti ve yathāsaddhaṃ, yathāpasādanaṃyattha pasādanaṃ jano;
content.gatha2: Tattha yo maṅku bhavatitattha ce maṃku yo hotitattha yo maṅkuto hoti , paresaṃ pānabhojane;
content.gathalast: Na so divā vā rattiṃ vā, samādhimadhigacchati.
content.gatha1: Yassa cetaṃ samucchinnaṃ, mūlaghaccaṃmūlaghacchaṃ samūhataṃ;
content.gathalast: Sa ve divā vā rattiṃ vā, samādhimadhigacchati.
content.gatha1: Natthi rāgasamo aggi, natthi dosasamo gaho;
content.gathalast: Natthi mohasamaṃ jālaṃ, natthi taṇhāsamā nadī.
content.gatha1: Sudassaṃ vajjamaññesaṃ, attano pana duddasaṃ;
content.gatha2: Paresaṃ hi so vajjāni, opunātiophunāti yathā bhusaṃ;
content.gathalast: Attano pana chādeti, kaliṃva kitavā saṭho.
content.gatha1: Paravajjānupassissa , niccaṃ ujjhānasaññino;
content.gathalast: Āsavā tassa vaḍḍhanti, ārā so āsavakkhayā.
content.gatha1: Ākāseva padaṃ natthi, samaṇo natthi bāhire;
content.gathalast: Papañcābhiratā pajā, nippapañcā tathāgatā.
content.gatha1: Ākāseva padaṃ natthi, samaṇo natthi bāhire;
content.gathalast: Saṅkhārā sassatā natthi, natthi buddhānamiñjitaṃ.
